name: Aquapark - Lobby
description:
Lobby is all about fun and friends !

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES
Last man standing, race, eat everything ... jump in intense multiplayer battles!
Find the one where you'll be the best!

FUN TOGETHER
Chill with your band while having a good time and voice chatting.

MAKE NEW FRIENDS
Add a great profile picture and get chatting witth public rooms!

COMPETE
Check how you compare on our global leaderboard!
Win, level up, unlock rewards and fame!

And it's all free!
